tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE field_maintenance_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    assigned_to VARCHAR(100),
    scheduled_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status ENUM('pending', 'completed'),
    task_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    schedule_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FieldMaintenanceTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending',
    task_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TaskSchedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    schedule_time TIME,
    schedule_location VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES FieldMaintenanceTasks(task_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceWorkers (
    worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    worker_phone VARCHAR(15) UNIQUE,
    worker_email VARCHAR(255),
    worker_specialty VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    due_date DATE,
    assigned_to VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    frequency VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    recurring BOOLEAN,
    task_id INT REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE task_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT REFERENCES tasks(task_id),
    log_date DATE,
    log_time TIME,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    worker_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    log_description TEXT
);
